snippet.title: Beyond Allies and Enemies | World of the dead | Official PV
snippet.description:
#worldofthedead #steam #extractionshooter #fps 

World of the dead is a post-apocalyptic horror PvPvE extraction shooter featuring survival elements.

You are one of the few survivors left after a recent scourge of the dead.  Survive solo or with trusted allies in a world overrun by the rotting dead and insidious otherworldly creatures. In this anomaly-ridden land, your priority is to prove your worth by scavenging essential supplies from both monsters and other survivors, and escaping to safety through safe zones. 

We are working hard to include a demo version of our game in the upcoming Steam Next Fest, which runs from October 14th to October 21st!

Wishlist Now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3144060/World_of_the_dead/
